title: Kill Kagha
content:
gone, and that you are here to get rid of her. This immediately initiates combat, and triggers the war between the Druids and the Tieflings.

How to unlock Kill Kagha

Kill Kagha Rewards

This subquest hast no direct rewards. Indirect Rewards (drops, related quest rewards, etc.) Hellrider's Pride (reward from Zevlor dialogue; obtained via any method that stops Kagha's ritual, killing Kagha is not required) Broodmother's Revenge (dropped by Kagha) Key of the Ancients (dropped by Findal if he was
